div.p: >> Jon: WELCOME BACK, MY GUEST A GRAMMY WING MUDICIAN,
HER NEW ALBUM IS CALLED RADIO MUSIC SOCIETY.
PERFORMING BLACK GOLD FROM THAT, PLEASE WELCOME ESPERANZA SPALDING.
(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE) ♪ ♪ HOLD YOUR HEAD AS HIGH AS YOU CAN ♪
♪ HIGH ENOUGH TO SEE WHO YOU ARE LITTLE MAN SNOED SNOED LIFE IS SOMETIMES IN COLD
AND CRUEL ♪ BABY NO ONE ELSE WILL TELL YOU SO REMEMBER THAT ♪
